subject: Hello Dear Honey,
body:
Hello Dear Honey,
How are you today? I hope my message finds you well,really it's has been a while we stopped communication but finally the almighty God keep my dream forward and real, i want to surprise you because you tried to shown me care and concern,but then you didn't believe me as i was in need of your assistance Maybe you where unable to receive the deal fund based on the developments but I thank God that all is well now. I am very happy to Inform you that I have finally succeeded with assistance from my new partner from Senegal but.
Presently I'm in Australia for investment projects, meanwhile I did not forget your past efforts and attempts to assist me despite it failed us somehow but I'm very much glad to inform you that I wrote a cheque In your name worth of ($350,000.00 US Dollars) (Three Hundred and Fifty Thousand US Dollar) as a compassion I am giving you this money because of your past efforts and attempts to assist me, I want you to Feel free and contact they bank with this information below:
Bank Name:UBA Bank.
Bank Manager Name Dr.Mike Abdul.
Email:ubabankafrica02@gmail.com
Telephone: +221706194765
Pleace contact the United bank Africa (UBA)to send the cheque to you which I kept for you ($350,000.00 US Dollars) for your past efforts and attempt to assist me I really appreciate your past efforts so much Please my love try to get in touch with the bank so that they will transfer the money to you did this because I do not know anybody there in Senegal that's was why I deposited the cheque to the bank moreover I donâ€™t want my new partner to know about it, but the cheque you can make withdrawals from any bank of your choice over there in your country or any where in the world because is an international cheque however I am very busy here due to My investment projects with my new partner because we want to do some investment here and as well in my country.Finally, remember that I had forwarded an instructions to the bank on your behalf for you to receive that bank draft please honey contact the bank Now and write back to me immediately.
Looking forward to your next letter
Regards
Yours Love...
Sophie Karren (Ms.)

subject: Re:   Hello Dear Honey,
body:
Hello Sophie Karren Ms.,

I'm doing well, thank you for asking. It's great to hear that you're doing well in Australia and have started some investment projects. That sounds really exciting!

I appreciate your kind gesture of writing a cheque in my name. However, I'm a bit confused about the details. Could you please clarify why you chose to deposit the cheque in Senegal? Also, could you provide more information about this bank manager Abdul?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Heather
